alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 01 at 2:14PM PST until February 03 at 4:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM PST /8 AM MST/ WEDNESDAY TO 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ THURSDAY... * WHAT...North winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts over 60 mph possible. 2 to 4 foot waves for area lakes also possible. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu, Fort Mohave and the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Laughlin and the Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...From 7 AM PST /8 AM MST/ Wednesday to 4 PM PST /5 PM MST/ Thursday. * IMPACTS...Strong wind gusts could lead to damage to some trees and power lines resulting in power outages. Isolated structural damage may also result. High wave action on area lakes resulting in very dangerous, potentially life threatening boating conditions. Areas of blowing dust may also result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds are expected to peak during the afternoon on Wednesday, but strong winds gusts could begin as early as sunrise for parts of the Colorado River Valley and could linger through Thursday. An upgrade to a High Wind Warning may be needed if conditions exceed expectations.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
